response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to both parties involved. I understand its worth to you stands at $1,000,000. Considering its unique features and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $950,000. This special opportunity allows you to acquire this valuable asset at a reduced cost, maximizing your savings while securing a deal before it potentially becomes unavailable to others. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
